title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Enterprise, Trade and Employment
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Enterprise, Trade and Employment 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited enterprise trade employment (delegation ministerial functions) order 2022

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment conferred on him – 

(a) by or under the enactments specified in Part 1 of the 

Schedule, 

(b) by or under the provision of the enactment specified in Part 2 of 

the Schedule, and 

(c) under the Regulations specified in Part 3 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to Dara Calleary, Minister of State at the Department of 
Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [486] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister enterprise trade employment conferred - (a) enactment specified part 1 schedule (b) provision enactment specified part 2 schedule (c) regulation specified part 3 schedule delegated dara calleary minister state department enterprise trade employment notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 30th september 2022 486 3

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of
heading: Hallmarking Act 1981 (No. 18 of 1981)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

PART 1 

Hallmarking Act 1981 (No. 18 of 1981) 

Partnership Act 1890 (53 & 54 Vict. c. 39) 

Limited Partnerships Act 1907 (7 Edw. 7. c. 24) 

Industrial and Provident Societies Acts 1893 to 2021 

Friendly Societies Acts 1896 to 2021 

Registration of Business Names Act 1963 (No. 30 of 1963) 

Competition and Consumer Protection Act 2014 (No. 29 of 2014) 

Competition Acts 2002 to 2022 

Consumer Protection Acts 2007 to 2019 

Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014) 

Assurance Companies Act 1909 (9 Edw. 7. c. 49) 

Sale of Goods Act 1893 (56 & 57 Vict., c. 71) 

Sale of Goods and Supply of Services Act 1980 (No. 16 of 1980) 

Liability for Defective Products Act 1991 (No. 28 of 1991) 

Package Holidays and Travel Trade Act 1995 (No. 17 of 1995) 

Consumer Credit Act 1995 (No. 24 of 1995) 

Unit Trusts Act 1990 (No. 37 of 1990) 

Occasional Trading Act 1979 (No. 35 of 1979) 

Casual Trading Act 1995 (No. 19 of 1995) 

Irish Takeover Panel Act 1997 (No. 5 of 1997) 

Personal Injuries Assessment Board Acts 2003 to 2019 

Designated Investment Funds Act 1985 (No. 16 of 1985) 

Control of Exports Act 2008 (No. 1 of 2008) 

Sale of Tickets (Cultural, Entertainment, Recreational and Sporting Events) 
Act 2021 (No. 21 of 2021) 

Companies (Corporate Enforcement Authority) Act 2021 (No. 48 of 2021) 

PART 2 

Section 142(2) of the Irish Collective Asset-management Vehicles Act 2015 
(No. 2 of 2015) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [486] 

PART 3 

Control of Exports (Dual Use Items) Order 2009 (S.I. No. 443 of 2009) 

Control of Exports (Appeals) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 457 of 2018) 

European Communities (Intra-Community Transfers of Defence Related 
Products) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 346 of 2011) 

European Communities (Directive 2000/31/EC) Regulations 2003 (S.I. No. 68 
of 2003) 

Decimal Currency (Friendly Society and Industrial Assurance Contracts) 
Regulations 1971 (S.I. No. 64 of 1971) 

European Communities (European Economic Interest Groupings) Regulations 
1989 and 2010 

European Communities (Food Imitations) (Safety) Regulations 1991 (S.I. No. 
265 of 1991) 

European Communities (Labelling of Footwear) Regulations 1996 (S.I. No. 63 
of 1996) 

Companies Act 1990 (Uncertificated Securities) Regulations 1996 (S.I. No. 68 
of 1996) 

European Communities (European Public Limited Liability Company) 
Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 21 of 2007) 

Transparency (Directive 2004/109/EC) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 277 of 
2007) 

European Communities (Admissions to Listing and Miscellaneous Provisions) 
Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 286 of 2007) 

European Communities (Safety of Toys) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 14 of 
2011) 

European Union (Simple Pressure Vessels) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 227 of 
2016) 

European Union (Appliances Burning Gaseous Fuels) Regulations 2018 and 
2022 

European Union (Anti-Money Laundering: Beneficial Ownership of Corporate 
Entities) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 110 of 2019) 

European Union 
Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 597 of 2019) 

(Qualifying Partnerships: Accounting and Auditing) 

European Communities (Aerosol Dispensers) Regulations 1977 (S.I. No. 144 
of 1977) 

 
 
 
 
 [486] 5 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

27 September, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [486]
